awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: On a quick trip to the city, young university professor Peter Morgan falls in love with nightclub performer Francey Brent and marries her after a whirlwind romance. But when he goes back home, he can't bring himself to tell his conservative, ultra-respected family about it.

title: Vivacious Lady
